Title: Fruiting metrics in Cactaceae- A meta-analysis
Goal: Identify and isolate the combined results of relevant studies in Cactaceae in regards to fruiting patterns.
Timeline: Derived data extracted by December 2018. Paper written by January 2019.

Title: Strength of birds as pollinators and seed dispersers in Cactaceae
Goal: Connect bird interactions with flowering and fruiting in cacti of different endangerment status.
Timeline: Flowering field season January-Febuary April-May 2019. Fruiting field season August 2019. Paper written by January 2020.

Title: Avian pollination and seed dispersal influence on seed shadow of Cactaceae obligatory facilitatees
Goal: Determine the role of birds as pollinators and seed dispersers for Saguaro ssp.
Timeline: Flowering field season April-May 2020. Fruitnig field season August 2020. Paper written by December 2020.
